    • Method Detail

      • addChatText

        public static void addChatText(java.lang.String chat)

      • changeConnection

        static void changeConnection(java.lang.String address,
                             int portNum)
        Resets the main receive Thread to the correct port (from the server)
        Parameters:
        address - The new IP address to send to.
        portNum - The port to change to.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • sendIPToServer

        static void sendIPToServer()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method will connect the Buddy Server and update the IP address for the user. This method will then request a port from the server and try to store the port sent back in the variable audioPort.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - If there is a problem with the socket or getting local IP address.

      • startServerCall

        static void startServerCall()
        Sends the "5" command to the server, starting the proxy. Receives the port number to use, which is stored in audioPort. Should only be called when in server mode.
